events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item shipment.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund process.
Hello, I’m Sarah. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to proceed with the refund?
I have attached the photo of the wrong product and my order number is 45321987. Please advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 48 hours.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been successfully completed. Thank you for contacting support.
